subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Matthew Stafford threw for a season-high 405 yards, receiver Calvin Johnson had six receptions for 166 yards and a score, and kicker Matt Prater hit a 27-yard field goal in overtime that won the game.
snippet: Matthew Stafford threw for a season-high 405 yards, receiver Calvin Johnson had six receptions for 166 yards and a score, and kicker Matt Prater hit a 27-yard field goal in overtime that won the game.
